scripts.deploy: next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -b master -d out -t true
scripts.deploy2: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rimraf out && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && touch out/CNAME&& echo "tonyhazama.github.io" >> out/CNAME&& gh-pages -b master -d out -t true
